name: Mixtape the Game
description:
Invite your friends to play music with Mixtape the Game!
Match the perfect song to a scenario and orchestrate past,
present, and future memories.

• Use a Spotify premium subscription to play
• Match the best song to the scenario
• Invite friends to play via phone contacts
• Invite Facebook Friends
• Join a game with strangers from around the world in
our public game lobby
• Laugh, Dance, Sing, WIN!

MIXTAPE gives you an opportunity to play your friends the soundtrack to your life. Music tied to memories, memories tied to emotions, emotions tied to life.

We challenge you to discover it for yourself. Enjoy!
